title: Zigfrid von Underbelly
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Pizza, International, Beer/Wine, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An independently owned bar & food house with a creative atmosphere that aims to include a vegan dish in every section on their menu. Some of these dishes are couscous salad; pizza with tofu, tomato, potato, sun-dried tomato, artichoke & friarielli; lentil burger; a sharing board with grilled vegetables, lentil balls, spelt salad, hummus & tofu; a nut roast is served on Sundays. The 3-course Christmas menu & buffet always includes a vegan choice. The ground floor has a no-step access and the venue has a disabled toilet. Downstairs is a live music venue, party space and an underground club. Upstairs is the food house, lounge, party space and DJ bar.
